description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items include: a cheap travel pass for young people on the European railroads; democracy in local government; new art gallery in Stuttgart; the invention of magnetic tape, by engineer Fritz Pfleumer, fifty years ago; the VW-Foundation; old Heidelberg and its famous castle ruins; the opening of a new car racing track at Nurburgring.
